room_title: Escape room "Wizard’s Academy" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
room_description: After several foolish wizards tampered with unknown powerful magic and almost destroyed the world, three Grand Wizards created Altum Magicae Academia. A school to learn the greatest secrets of magic and to control them wisely in hopes that the great cataclysm would not happen again. You have honed your skills in spells, potions, beasts, and the Arcane. Today is testing day. Only the knowledgeable, powerful and courageous will pass. Do you have what it takes to be accepted into the Wizard’s Academy?
